ygData.subject: Arise Optimus Prime = Alarm Clock...
ygData.msgSnippet: Deep below the Earth, there is a strange guttural (spelling errors?) groan, as the monster living down there has been awoken with those 3 words: Arise Optimus

------=_NextPart_000_004F_01C08978.76F93BE0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Deep below the Earth, there is a strange guttural (spelling errors?) groan,=
 as the monster living down there has been awoken with those 3 words: "Aris=
e Optimus Prime!" This monster is very cranky, he had been sleeping for MAN=
Y, MANY, MANY, MANY years, and now he's been woken up and he's really crank=
y. He just wants to freaking sleep and some guy is yelling and flashing lig=
hts up there! Grr! He is in his beast mode at this moment, and starts burro=
wing up to the surface, very wild, very dangerous, but not that smart. He b=
usts up to the surface, makes a big blurble sounds, and starts slowly movin=
g across the ground. It was like a slug that stood up tall, large, bloatedl=
y fat, brown, and without any limbs or eyes, just like a blob with a mouth.=
 His mouth always pointed straight up in the air as he wiggled and moved sl=
owly across the ground. All of those years of sleep made him forget his ide=
ntity, and his robot mode as well. As he moved, he ended up changing into h=
is robot mode and back, hinting that he did indeed remember how to change, =
he just wasn't aware of the change when it happened. He slowly moved along,=
 looking for something. Enter: Like-Like. (Know what I'm talking about here=
, people?)
